name: Jewels Dash Match3
description:
Jewels Dash Match3 is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful gem crunching effects and well designed puzzles for you to play in subway time! With candy style jewels to smash and eliminate in each level
How to Play:
- Swap the jewels to match 3 in a line to remove them
- Arcade Mode: Reach a specific goal to solve the puzzle saga
- Time Mode: Match as fast as you can to level up
